00010 // of node columns.

00021 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 // Function: SystemColumnLayout()
00023 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00024 SystemColumnLayout::SystemColumnLayout(QGraphicsScene* scene) : scene_(scene), columns_(),
00025                                                             layoutWidth_(0.0), offsetY_(0)
00026 {
00027 }
00028 
00029 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 // Function: ~SystemColumnLayout()
00031 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 SystemColumnLayout::~SystemColumnLayout()
00033 {
00034     // Delete all columns and clear the column list.
00035     for (int i = 0; i < columns_.size(); ++i)
00036     {
00037         delete columns_.at(i);
00038     }
00039 
00040     columns_.clear();
00041 }
00042 
00043 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 // Function: addColumn()
00045 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 void SystemColumnLayout::addColumn(QString const& name)
00047 {
00048     // Create the node column and position it accordingly.
00049     SystemColumn* column = new SystemColumn(name, this, scene_);
00050     column->setPos(layoutWidth_, 0.0);
00051 
00052     addColumn(column);
00053 }
00054 
00055 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 //  Function: addColumn()
00057 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 void SystemColumnLayout::addColumn(SystemColumn* column)
00059 {
00060     if (column->scene() == 0)
00061     {
00062         scene_->addItem(column);
00063     }
00064 
00065     column->setOffsetY(offsetY_);
00066 
00067     connect(column, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00068 
00069     // Add the column to the list of columns and update the layout width.
00070     columns_.append(column);
00071     layoutWidth_ += column->boundingRect().width();
00072 
00073     // Update the position in the layout.
00074     HStackedLayout::updateItemMove(columns_, column);
00075     HStackedLayout::setItemPos(columns_, column, 0.0);
00076 
00077     emit contentChanged();
00078 }
00079 
00080 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 // Function: removeColumn()
00082 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 void SystemColumnLayout::removeColumn(SystemColumn* column)
00084 {
00085     if (columns_.removeAll(column) > 0)
00086     {
00087         layoutWidth_ -= column->boundingRect().width();
00088         HStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(columns_, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00089         scene_->removeItem(column);
00090 
00091         emit contentChanged();
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 // Function: removeColumn()
00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 void SystemColumnLayout::removeColumn(int index)
00099 {
00100     columns_.removeAt(index);
00101     HStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(columns_, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00102 
00103     emit contentChanged();
00104 }
00105 
00106 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 // Function: findColumnAt()
00108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 SystemColumn* SystemColumnLayout::findColumnAt(QPointF pt)
00110 {
00111     for (int i = 0; i < columns_.size(); ++i)
00112     {
00113         // The point is inside the column if the x coordinate is within it (y can be anything).
00114         if (pt.x() >= columns_.at(i)->sceneBoundingRect().left() &&
00115             pt.x() < columns_.at(i)->sceneBoundingRect().right())
00116         {
00117             return columns_.at(i);
00118         }
00119     }
00120 
00121     return 0;
00122 }
00123 
00124 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00125 // Function: onMoveColumn()
00126 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 void SystemColumnLayout::onMoveColumn(SystemColumn* column)
00128 {
00129     // Clamp the coordinates.
00130     QPointF pos = column->pos();
00131     pos.setY(0.0);
00132     pos.setX(std::max(std::min(pos.x(), layoutWidth_ - (column->boundingRect().width())), 0.0));
00133     column->setPos(pos);
00134     column->update();
00135 
00136     HStackedLayout::updateItemMove(columns_, column);
00137     emit contentChanged();
00138 }
00139 
00140 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 // Function: onReleaseColumn()
00142 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 void SystemColumnLayout::onReleaseColumn(SystemColumn* column)
00144 {
00145     HStackedLayout::setItemPos(columns_, column, 0.0);
00146 }
00147 
00148 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 // Function: setOffsetY()
00150 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 void SystemColumnLayout::setOffsetY(qreal y)
00152 {
00153     for (int i = 0; i < columns_.size(); ++i)
00154     {
00155         columns_.at(i)->setOffsetY(y);
00156     }
00157 
00158     offsetY_ = y;
00159 }
00160 
00161 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 // Function: getColumns()
00163 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00164 QList<SystemColumn*> const& SystemColumnLayout::getColumns() const
00165 {
00166     return columns_;
00167 }
